articles.title: Why 'The Batman' heading to theaters is important to Warner Bros - CNN
articles.description: After a year of simultaneously releasing movies on HBO Max and in theaters, Warner Bros. returns to exclusive theatrical releases bearing a rather sizable gift: "The Batman."
